name: WhiskeyNotes
tag_list: whiskey, whisky, scotch, bourbon, rye, beverages, alcohol
overview:
WhiskeyNotes is a community of people who enjoy tasting, discussing and sharing notes on all kinds of whiskey from scotch to rye. You can use it to organize all your tasting notes, get recommendations or simply to see what other people are drinking. WhiskeyNotes is the only wiki-style database of whiskey information that allows anyone to contribute.

Beyond saving tastings, the site allows whiskey-fans to save bottles to their shelf, add bottles to a wishlist, follow other people’s tastings and get bottle recommendations (coming soon!).
